name: Landing Platform
description: This is the roof of the ruined building. Though the paint has blistered and flaked away, you can still make out the markings that designate this as a platform for ariel vehicles. The door to the stairs stands open to the south.

name: Stairwell Level 5
description: The stairwell is lit exclusively by dim green strips set into the concrete walls. The stairs spiral down into absolute darkness. There is door marked 'EXIT' here.
